gameDetails.name: The Quest for El Dorado: Dangers & Muisca
gameDetails.description: New adventures in The Quest for El Dorado! This expansion introduces the new modules “Dangers” and “Muisca”. The Muisca is a mysterious tribe that wants to help you find the city of gold. “Dangers” brings new challenges such as crocodiles, rapids and temples with keys to the City of Gold. Combine with new cave tokens for even more variety!
